titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an David Pinsent, [10. 2. 1915 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Pinsent, 1990, S. 101/Anmerkung; deutsch: Pinsent, 1994, S. 170/Anmerkung).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Got today your letter dated January 27th. This is about the limit. I'm now beginning to be more fertile again
